verses.verse: <WG1161> The same<WG1722> <WG1565> day<WG2250> went<WG1831> Jesus<WG2424> out of<WG575> the house<WG3614>, and sat<WG2521> by<WG3844> the sea side<WG2281>.

<WG1161> The field<WG68> is<WG2076> the world<WG2889>;<WG1161> the good<WG2570> seed<WG4690> are<WG3778> <WG1526> the children<WG5207> of the kingdom<WG932>; but<WG1161> the tares<WG2215> are<WG1526> the children<WG5207> of the wicked<WG4190> one;
